title: Oman Sohar Seaside Escape Minutes from the Sea
description: Only minutes from the sea, Crowne Plaza Sohar, an IHG Hotel, is your gateway to a vibrant seaside city escape. Rejuvenate yourself with a relaxing stroll through lush gardens, a refreshing dip in the pool or a sophisticated cocktail at the poolside bar. Get your heart racing as you revitalise your body and mind at the fitness centre or aim for a strike at the bowling alley. Savour traditional cuisine at the onsite restaurants before retiring to a stylish room.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Sohar, an IHG Hotel
